overview:
His favourite Deezer album is Daft Punk Alive 2007.

Daniel Marhely, a 27 year-old self-made man and proud of it, left school at 16 to focus on his passion for the web.

In 2000, he headed the web department of the agrafe communications agency. In 2002, he decided to focus exclusively on web development. Two years later, he co-founded the dating website “Lovelee.com”. In 2006, he co-founded the company Aliza Medias. At the same time, he was exchanging music with his friends, a lot of music with a lot of friends, sharing his musical passions, tastes and moods. He started Blogmusik, a streaming music site. At that time, the website did not meet with Sacem*’s approval. So, he decided to stop Blogmusik and negotiate directly with rights owners.

On August 22nd 2007, a historical agreement was signed with royalty collecting agencies. Blogmusik was reborn Deezer.com.

France’s ﬁrst free and legal music-on-demand website was created.
